meanings.sent1: I love taking pictures with my digicams.
meanings.sent2: She bought two new digicams for her photography hobby.
meanings.sent3: The digicams captured the funny moments at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like digicams, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The digicams clicked away, preserving memories in pixels.

meanings.definition: Cameras that use digital technology to capture and store images.
meanings.sent1: The digicams at the store had impressive features.
meanings.sent2: Photographers prefer digicams for their convenience.
meanings.sent3: The detective used digicams to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like digicams, storing memories digitally.
meanings.sent5: The digicams beeped as they focused on the subject.

meanings.definition: The shortened form of digital cameras.
meanings.sent1: He referred to digital cameras as digicams.
meanings.sent2: The manual explained the functions of the digicams.
meanings.sent3: The digicams were the talk of the photography class.
meanings.sent4: Her bag was full of digicams for the trip.
meanings.sent5: The digicams were on sale at the electronics store.
